body:
@bradfitz, to be clear, the currently proposed JSON format doesn't capture most of what's interesting about this proposal (custom metrics and benchmark metadata), and according to https://github.com/golang/go/issues/2981#issuecomment-240600442, it seems these things are out of scope for the current JSON proposal.

Not that there's any harm in closing this issue. We're already using this format. But it's not a dup of #2981 since it covers different ground.
